## Introduction

The ABCs of Data are a strategy developed by Project CREDIBLE researchers and teachers to support K-12 students to analyze and interpret data. The ABCs of Data consists of three steps that reflect the core aspects of analyzing and interpreting data:

1.  Account for what you know
2.  Be open to evidence
3.  Consider your confidence now

Learn more about the ABCs of Data in [this article in NSTA's *The Science Teacher*](https://osf.io/rg6xb/download)
